summary: Two teenage boys aspire to win a backyard wrestling championship and a chance to appear on a national TV show.
cast: Scott Hamm|Bree Turner|Walter Jones|Roger Fan|Dale Evans|Jesse Lizarraga|Robert 'Bo' Cooper|Kaori Taylor|Vincent Van Patten|Woody Brown|Nels Van Patten|James Van Patten|Frankie Kazarian|Torrey Dickinson|Jan Ohrstrom|Stan Bly|Mike Henderson|Sonny Mario Ayon|Kenneth Charles Jones|Mike Vallely|Barbara Porter|Jessie Hernandez|Lionel Ortega|Cole S. McKay|Michael Silverwood|Eiji Ezaki|Cody Michaels|Tom Probst|Max Radcliffe|Brad Barnholtz
title: Backyard Dogs
